segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad to see her so disconnected from what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's just tired or really that oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should tell her to pay attention, but I don't want to bother her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she's focused on the plate is almost hypnotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what's happening before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children behind her, quietly taking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm scared they might fall or slip on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she would be horrified if she knew what was going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit sorry for her, missing out on these moments.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she wakes up from her daze soon and joins the fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
